careers.title: Work with Us
careers.description: Here are the positions we are looking to fill in the Nice Adventures team.
reasons: We are looking for members to join our team for the next years; this is a commitment that will provide long-term job stability.
We offer a friendly work environment, with no crunch, organized work methodologies, no sudden changes in direction, and no arbitrary deadlines.
We have a Personal Improvement program where we identify your goals and do what we can to help you achieve them.
We are working on a cool game, and you can be a part of it.
careers.footer: We are creating an amazing game, and we need your help to continue. If you are interested in this position, fill out the form.

about.title: “We are a Game Studio Making Adventure Games”
about.description: Nice Adventures is an independent video game studio from Barranquilla, Colombia. Founded in 2022 to create adventure games. We are currently working on our first action-adventure game, “Adventure in Henders Castle“. We also offer some custom development services for clients to support our Game Making Endeavors.

services.title: Software Development
services.description: With over a decade of experience, we've built software platforms that have reached hundreds of thousands of users. Our expertise spans payment systems, crypto exchanges, mobile apps, and cloud platforms. More recently, we’ve been integrating advanced AI, like ChatGPT, into customer service and content solutions. We're passionate about helping people turn their ideas into reality and building to succeed.
